p: Calpurnia aurea is scattered all over the parts of the country, and a sizable number of it has been used for the general treatment of diseased animals. However, there is no scientific basis for the therapeutic actions of traditional Calpurnia aurea medicines which might serve as the source for the development of more effective drugs. So, the objective of the current study was to evaluate the antimicrobial activities and to determine phytochemicals of crude extracts of Calpurnia aurea against a selected isolate of animal pathogenic bacterial strains.
